welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Xinfeng, a charming city known for its breathtaking landscapes and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

airports.airport_name: Taiwan Taoyuan International (Chiang Kai Shek International)

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal of Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport, dedicated to international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a mobile phone number is required for verification.
